sentences.en: In the mouth of Loch Aline we found a great seagoing ship at anchor.
sentences.cn: 在亚林湾的出口处,我们发现那儿停泊了一艘出海的大船.

sentences.en: It is used on coated steel hulls on seagoing vessels, workboats and barges.
sentences.cn: 可涂布于航行中船只, 作业船和驳船的已涂漆的钢船壳上.

sentences.en: The word & quot ; knots & quot ; is a seagoing speed term meaning nautical miles per hour.
sentences.cn: “节”这个词是海航速度的术语,意思是海里每小时.

trans.tran_en: built to travel on the sea
